definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The fax has switched to the transmit mode.
sentences.chinese: 传真机已转换到传送模式。

sentences.english: A colleague in Ghana had telex but no fax.
sentences.chinese: 在加纳共和国的同事有电传机，但没有传真机。

sentences.english: Along with the network popularization, the digital facsimile emerges as the times require.
sentences.chinese: 随着网络的普及，数字传真机应运而生。

sentences.english: How does this fax machine work?
A sudden major increase in corporate use of fax machines nearly put this small company out of business.
sentences.chinese: 公司使用传真机的突增使这家小公司几近倒闭。

sentences.english: The invention of the facsimile machine was a great contribution to communication.
sentences.chinese: 传真机的发明是对通讯联系的一项巨大贡献。

sentences.english: Can you tell me how to use the fax machine?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我怎么使用这台传真机吗？

sentences.english: B: I guess the fax machine is out of paper, too.
sentences.chinese: 我猜是传真机真的没纸了。

sentences.english: So the fax machine actually saves a step.
sentences.chinese: 因此，传真机实际上为我们省略了这一步。

sentences.english: You can sign the contract when we deliver the machine.
sentences.chinese: 你们可以在我们送传真机时再签合同。

sentences.english: The fax machine allows any fax to be sent in either high or low resolution.
sentences.chinese: 这一台传真机可选择传高解析度或者低解析度。

sentences.english: Sorry, sir, the machine is receiving an in-coming fax, please wait a moment.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，先生，传真机正在接收传真，请稍等一下。

sentences.english: Use FAX PAPER ROLLS from inventory on the fax machine at reception desk.
sentences.chinese: 使用传真纸卷从库存传真机上在前台。

sentences.english: I need a hand with the fax machine. My fax is not going through.
sentences.chinese: 我需要有人帮我看一下传真机，我无法将文件传过去。

definition: electronic switching system (telecom.)/stored program control exchange (SPC)
